errors.error_description: The README claims Twine is compatible with Python 2.7, but the |python-versions| badge shows it requires Python 3.8+, creating a version compatibility conflict.
correction_candidates: Remove the sentence stating it is compatible with Python 2.7.
Change the sentence to 'Twine requires Python 3.8 or newer.'
Install an older version of Twine that supports Python 2.7.
Update the |python-versions| badge to include Python 2.7.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the sentence stating it is compatible with Python 2.7.
